normalized: four days later.
a room in a skyscraper among a group of high-rise buildings, which were being developed as a sub-city in f prefecture.
in there was asagi.
the top floor of the skyscraper.
it was a room in the section known as the penthouse, where the living space consisted of one entire floor.
it was the third safehouse the taimanin planned to make their headquarters in times of crisis.
asagi had already erased the backup data in the first and second safehouses.
this place was the storage location of the last data backup.

name: asagi
normalized: （so it's the last with this.
i have to finish quickly.
it was unavoidable because asagi was on her own, but nevertheless, it was taking considerable time just to destroy the backup data.
fortunately, she had been able to keep her activities secret until today, but it wouldn't be strange for enemies to appear at any moment.
the safety of sakura and murasaki, and the fact that the village had been occupied by enemies, were concerns.
kousuke and asuka too.
she couldn't waste even a second of time.
asagi booted up a specialized computer that took up the whole surface of the wall, and ordered it to completely erase the data in accordance with a predetermined procedure.
it was literally a complete erasure.
even if, for argument's sake, the enemy discovered this place, she absolutely could not allow them to restore the data.
it wasn't something limited to the taimanin.
this sort of process was scrupulously practiced by organizations everywhere.

for example, if it were a magnetic disk, after filling the storage space with random data several dozens of times, she would erase the data itself by strong magnetic exposure, and furthermore, destroy it physically as well.
it looked like this safehouse's computer was carrying it out, even going as far as internal incineration.
smoke rose up faintly from the machine, and a burning smell began to waft.

name: asagi
normalized: with this, it's ok.
asagi took a breath.
having safely destroyed the last of the backup data, she was, as one would expect, relieved.
then, that moment――
ririririririririri♪

name: asagi
normalized: hyaa!
suddenly, the phone began to ring.
asagi was so surprised that she jumped up.

name: asagi
normalized: that's awfully good timing.
who is it?
the number for this place was known only by her comrades.
when she looked at the caller's name, it was 「yamamoto」.

name: asagi
normalized: director?
asagi put the phone on speaker.

name: asagi
normalized: hello?
even saying that was strange, but she had no other way to say it.

name: yamamoto
normalized: it's yamamoto.
asagi?

name: asagi
normalized: yeah.

name: yamamoto
normalized: judging from the situation, i get the feeling this is the last place.
it was yamamoto's voice again, after four days.
but she couldn't sense fatigue.

name: asagi
normalized: i just finished everything now.
apart from that, what's wrong, director?
the fact that you got in touch with me will be exposed to the authorities immediately.

name: yamamoto
normalized: as a matter of fact, i got a call from a friend not long ago.
it was a tip-off that the kanda brigade had dispatched a unit to locate the last safehouse.

name: asagi
normalized: hmm, and you were thinking they might arrive any moment now.
it seemed he had still been doing lots of things while he was a prisoner.
typical of yamamoto.

name: yamamoto
normalized: the information was from 4 hours ago.
depart from that place immediately.

name: asagi
normalized: i'm grateful for the information, but if you act as my ally, won't your position be compromised?

name: yamamoto
normalized: if the prime minister intended to kill me, he would have killed me already.
at this point, it looks like he's holding something back.

name: yamamoto
normalized: …asagi, i'm sorry.
this will be your last backup from me.

name: asagi
normalized: that's enough.
when we next meet, i'll be carrying edwin black's head.

name: yamamoto
normalized: good luck.

name: asagi
normalized: you too, director.
she terminated the call.

name: asagi
normalized: looks like i don't even have time to take a break.
asagi said.

name: asagi
normalized: and now…
asagi abruptly started taking off her clothes.
when she got down to her underwear, she retrieved some equipment from a rack hidden in the floor.
new taimanin clothes.
and, a very long anti-demon sword.

name: asagi
normalized: i have to dress up to meet them, don't i?
a faint smile arose on the edges of her crimson lips.
the smile.
of a beautiful, ferocious.
beast.

name: asagi
normalized: fufu…
there was no need to run away anymore.
she was going to meet them.
a few hours later.
late that night.
bon!
the explosive sound she had hungered for.
the penthouse's extravagant doors were blown off.
fully armed soldiers were infiltrating from the entrance, trying to push their way through the fumes.
there were two of the kanda brigade's platoons.

name: kondou
normalized: our top priority is seizure of the data.
remember, don't get careless!
a taimanin might be lurking.
the figure of captian kondou, who was commanding the unit, appeared.

name: soldiers
normalized: yes sir!
the soldiers were enthusiastic.
and then, at almost the same time as their infiltration,
gashaannh!
the windowpane in the furthest room was broken.
the kanda brigade's assault force, which had come down from the rooftop by rope, invaded from there as well, one by one.
it was, in theory, a surprise pincer attack.
but even so, having been predicted, it was merely the basis for their defeat, and nothing more.
the essence of surprise attacks and pincer attacks was to surprise one's opponent, but for the soldiers, who had been waited for, that was of no use whatsoever.
now, the soldiers were going to learn that firsthand.

name: asagi
normalized: i've been waiting.
asagi, who had completely suppressed her presence until now, stood up.
white taimanin clothes, without even a smudge, like fresh snow.
a ninja katana of the usual length, and a very long anti-demon sword.
asagi was fully equipped.
the assault unit, who were surprised, were too slow to deal with it.

name: commander
normalized: uu, uu… teh?!

name: asagi
normalized: yaahh!
zubahh!
asagi cut down a soldier who appeared to be the commander in an instant.
it was a chinese bamboo cut.
(tl: vertical, from top to bottom.
he was split in two, from his head to his groin.
while raising a spray, that man slowly split to the left and right.
the soldiers, who had lost their leader, were weak.
the more particularly disciplined soldiers they were, the greater the damage from losing their commander.
in accordance with that cardinal rule, asagi had crushed the enemy's vital point first.

name: asagi
normalized: hahh!
juu, juu, juu!
next, three soldiers died.
the kunai asagi fired were sticking deeply into the crowns of their heads.
the three superior, but unlucky, people had tried to point their guns at asagi during the shock from having lost their commander in an instant.

name: asagi
normalized: haahh!
asagi's preemptive attack continued.
just as she was charging at the soldiers―who were still overcome with surprise, and standing completely still―she pulled out the long anti-demon sword from her back.
jakinn!
she extended the sliding sword blade as far as the tip in one go.
the polished sword blade was shining dully.
bechaa!
then, finally, the body of the commander, who had been cut through first, fell apart to the left and right on the floor.
the bloodspray scattered as far as the ceiling.
bababababababababaah!
accordingly, the soldiers finally started to shoot.
but by that time, it was already too late.
their aim was also haphazard.

name: asagi
normalized: haahh!
zubaahh!
zubabababaahh!
asagi closed in on the soldiers in an instant.
she swung the very long anti-demon sword in her right hand, and the ninja katana in her left, as she pleased.
with each swing, human bodies were being cut in half, vertically and horizontally.
a complete change from the time she had appeared, they were slash attacks with no showing off whatsoever.
the soldiers were being killed one by one.
she didn't even give them time to scream.
all of the soldiers were cut down in 5 seconds, and the last one was kicked out of the broken window.

name: soldier
normalized: aahh～～
his long-lasting scream faded away, and stopped along with an ominous squishy sound.
and then, silence.
1 platoon had been completely silenced.

name: asagi
normalized: even though i went to the trouble of dressing up, nobody told me what they thought.
asagi expressed a gruesome smile.
the walls and ceiling of the room were painted deep red with the soldiers' blood.
nevertheless, not a drop of blood was on asagi's pure white ninja clothes.
the two swords, which she lowered with both hands, were also the same way.
it looked as though, due to the extreme sharpness of the attacks, they had both forgotten to be soiled by the blood.

name: asagi
normalized: now, i wonder if there's yet another group of guests.
asagi confirmed the figures of the enemies on a monitor in the room.

name: asagi
normalized: that guy's the commander, eh?
an unattractive man who appeared to be giving instructions to the soldiers.
asagi didn't know his name yet, but that was captain kondou.

name: asagi
normalized: wait for me, because i'm coming now.
asagi decided on kondou as her target, and disappeared into the room's air duct.
――continued.
the safehouse had fallen silent.
kondou and three subordinate soldiers remained in the entrance.
kondou's face was grim, and his subordinates were unable to hide their anxiety.
communications from the assault troops had ceased one by one.
both the two platoons from the entrance, and the single platoon from the rooftop.
a few gunshots were heard, but no more than that.
surely they hadn't been defeated?
nobody was able to vocalize that terrifying thought.
it was impossible for three platoons of the kanda brigade to be annihilated in such a short amount of time.
then, a call came in.
it was from kanda.

name: kanda
normalized: what's wrong, captain?
it looks like there was shooting.

name: kondou
normalized: i don't know.
but… something's strange.
it's too quiet…
kotsukotsu…
footstep sounds from within.
three of kondou's guards prepared to use their guns.
however, the barrels were shaking.

name: kondou
normalized: n, no way…

name: kanda
normalized: what's wrong, captain?
kotsukotsu…

name: kondou
normalized: r, ridiculous…

name: kondou
normalized: that's… absurd…

name: kanda
normalized: captain, explain the situation!
kondou couldn't answer his superior officer.
he was screaming, his voice shaking.

name: kondou
normalized: wh, what are you doing?!
fire!
fire, fire!
however, the three guards were not able to perform that order.
asagi had silently fired kunai at them.
she had taken away their lives before they pulled their triggers.
quickly.
soundlessly.
it was a display of the real ability of a taimanin.

name: asagi
normalized: you've kept me waiting.
asagi said briefly.
and then, instantly, she tried to approach kondou.

name: kondou
normalized: uoohh!
bababababaahh!
kondou fired his gun while screaming.
but something like that wasn't going to hit her.

name: asagi
normalized: it's futile!
asagi casually dodged the bullets and drew close, then knocked down the vulnerable kondou's weapon.

name: asagi
normalized: i noticed you're the field commander.
there's something i wanted to ask.
she thrust the tip of the very long anti-demon sword at the nape of his neck.

name: kondou
normalized: wh, what happened to the 2 platoons who went inside?!
what about the group storming from the window?!
y, you killed all of them?!
asagi nodded in silence.

name: kondou
normalized: so it wasn't just yastu murasaki and igawa sakura… who were monster taimanin…
kondou muttered, dumbfounded.

name: kanda
normalized: captain, what happened?!
report the situation――
asagi destroyed the noisy radio by cutting it in two.

name: asagi
normalized: you know murasaki and sakura?!
sternness filled her voice.

name: kondou
normalized: heh heh… that's right, i know them.
i was giving them love until a little while ago, after all.

name: asagi
normalized: what…?!
asagi's expression stiffened.
kondou didn't fail to notice that.

name: kondou
normalized: what?
are those two pig bitches family or something?
he expressed a vulgar smile.

name: asagi
normalized: i'll have you answer my question.
you are a person from the kanda brigade, which has occupied the village, yes?
asagi suppressed her anger and asked.

name: kondou
normalized: that's right.
our main force occupies the village even now.

name: asagi
normalized: what about murasaki and sakura…?!
is everyone safe?
answer!
asagi moved the point of her sword.
the nape of kondou's neck was slightly cut, and blood overflowed.

name: kondou
normalized: kukuku… as i thought, looks like those pigs are your family, eh?
eh?
in that case, i'll tell you…
